about_the_game:
VRC PRO XTR Medium Track pack containing 6 spectacular long lay-outs starting with XTR MT3 and MT4.

The XTR track is part of the VRC Extreme Racing Complex Complex which is designed and developed by VRC and contains a unique crossing. This opens up numerous spectacular lay-out options. This XTR Medium Track pack will eventually contain 6 Medium Tracks. The other tracks XTR MT1 and 2, and MT5 and MT6 will be automatically added to this pack when they become available!
detailed_description:
VRC PRO XTR Medium Track pack containing 6 spectacular long lay-outs starting with XTR MT3 and MT4.

The XTR track is part of the VRC Extreme Racing Complex Complex which is designed and developed by VRC and contains a unique crossing. This opens up numerous spectacular lay-out options. This XTR Medium Track pack will eventually contain 6 Medium Tracks. The other tracks XTR MT1 and 2, and MT5 and MT6 will be automatically added to this pack when they become available!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP 3, .Net framework 3.5
  • Processor: Hyperthreaded Intel CPU, AMD Athlon 64 CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB Pixel Shader 2.0 graphics card (nVidia GeForce FX 5600 or ATI Radeon X600)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Windows 8, .Net framework 3.5
  • Processor: Multi-core CPU (Intel Core i5 or i7, AMD Phenom II QUAD X4)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB dedicated RAM, Pixel Shader 3.0 graphics card (AMD Radeon HD 5870, nVidia GTX 560)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: VRC USB adapter or controller, for hosting multiplayer sessions high upstream connection is recommended

short_description: VRC PRO XTR Medium Track pack containing 6 spectacular long lay-outs starting with XTR MT3 and MT4. The other medium tracks will be added when ready! This XTR Medium Track pack will eventually contain 6 Medium Tracks.
